description: Attacks can't be dodged and x2 Range
After spell cast: Attacks give 20% of max Mana
Adjacent allies gain a shield of 200 HP
Spells apply burn: 5% of enemies max Hp/s
Gain 20 Mana each time a spell is cast
Attacks deal 10% of wearer's max HP/s as splash damage
On start of combat: Banish an enemy for 5 seconds
Wearer gets revived with 300 HP (single use)
Heal for 25% of all damage dealt
Splls deal 100 splash damage on hit
On death: Heal all nearby allies for 1000HP
Attacks 2 extra targets with 50% of damage
Each second: 5% change to only Critical Strike
Attacks have a chance to Disarm
Attacks have a high chance to Silence
Enemies take 100 damage after casting a spell
Attacks have a small chance to Shrink (-1*)

ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it.

ability.name: Spirit Orb
ability.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line that returns to her, damaging enemies it passes through.

ability.name: Five Point Strike
ability.description: Akali throws shurikens in front of her, dealing damage.

ability.name: Glacial Storm
ability.description: Anivia channels a large hailstorm, damaging enemies inside of it.

ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
ability.description: Ashe fires an arrow that travels across the map, damages, and stuns (stun duration based on each hex traveled).

ability.name: Voice of Light
ability.description: Aurelion Sol breathes a large blast of fire in a line, dealing damage to enemies.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him.

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.description: Brand launches a bouncing fireball, damaging enemies hit.

ability.name: Unbreakable
ability.description: Braum creates a barrier that blocks all incoming damage.

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Cho'gath ruptures an area, stunning and damaging enemies inside of it.

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Darius swings his axe, damaging nearby enemies and healing himself based off his missing health.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description: Draven gains bonus on-hit damage and Attack Speed. Stacks up to two times.

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.description: Elise fires a cocoon stunning the nearest enemy and transforms, summoning 2 Spiderlings.

ability.name: Last Caress
ability.description: Evelynn deals damage to the 3 closest enemies and teleports away. Damage is increased against low health enemies.

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: Fiora becomes immune to damage and spells. After a short delay, she stuns and damages the closest enemy.

ability.name: Powder Kegs
ability.description: Gangplank periodically creates barrels. On cast, Gangplank detonates the barrels, damaging nearby enemies.

ability.name: Judgement
ability.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: GNAR!
ability.description: Gnar transforms and jumps behind the furthest enemy, damaging and shoving enemies backwards.

ability.name: Buckshot
ability.description: Graves' attacks deal splash damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Requiem
ability.description: Karthus deals damage to a number of random enemies after a long channel.

ability.name: Nether Blade
ability.description: Kassadin's attacks steal mana from enemies, converting it into a shield.

ability.name: Death Lotus
ability.description: Katarina channels and fires daggers at a number of nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing healing.

ability.name: Divine Judgement
ability.description: Kayle shields an ally, making them immune to damage.

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.description: Kennen summons a storm around him, dealing damage and stunning enemies inside of it.

ability.name: Taste their Fear
ability.description: Kha'Zix slashes the closest enemy, dealing bonus damage to enemies that are alone.

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.description: Kindred creates a zone around herself that prevents allies from dying.

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.description: Leona calls down a solar ray, stunning enemies in the center and dealing damage to enemies inside it.

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.description: Lissandra encases the target in ice, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Below half HP, Lissandra instead encases herself, becoming untargetable.

ability.name: Relentless Pursuit
ability.description: Lucian dashes away to safety and attacks an enemy twice, once with Attack Damage and once with Spell Damage.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: Lulu grants an ally bonus Health, knocking up enemies near them.

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.description: Miss Fortune channels and fires several waves of bullets in a cone.

ability.name: Obliterate
ability.description: Mordekaiser slams his mace in front him, dealing damage in a line.

ability.name: Soul Shackles
ability.description: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing damage and stunning after a short delay if they are still nearby.

ability.name: Primal Surge
ability.description: Nidalee heals herself and the weakest ally, then transforms.

ability.name: Keeper's Verdict
ability.description: Poppy brings down her hammer, knocking away nearby enemies.

ability.name: Phantom Undertow
ability.description: Pyke dashes behind the furthest enemy, creating an afterimage that stuns enemies it passes through.

ability.name: Burrow
ability.description: Rek'Sai burrows for a short duration becoming untargetable and healing. When Rek'Sai unburrows she deals damage and knocks up the closest enemy.

ability.name: Savagery
ability.description: Rengar leaps to the weakest enemy and stabs them.

ability.name: Glacial Prison
ability.description: Sejuani creates a large glacial storm, stunning enemies within it after a short delay.

ability.name: Spirit's Refuge
ability.description: Shen creates a zone around himself, allowing allies to dodge all attacks.

ability.name: Dragon's Descent
ability.description: Shyvana dashes away and transforms. While transformed, Shyvana's attacks become ranged and light the ground on fire.

ability.name: Demonflare
ability.description: Swain transforms, draining health from all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Explosive Charge
ability.description: Tristana places a bomb on her current target that detonates after 4 attacks, damaging nearby enemies.

ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.description: Varus charges and fires an arrow, dealing damage to all enemies in a line.

ability.name: Silver Bolts
ability.description: Vayne deals bonus true damage every third attack based on the enemy's maximum health.

ability.name: Primordial Burst
ability.description: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy. This spell instantly kills if the enemy is a lower star level than Veigar.

ability.name: Thunder Claws
ability.description: Volibear's attacks bounce between enemies.

ability.name: Infinite Duress
ability.description: Warwick pounces onto the lowest health enemy, stunning and damaging them.

ability.name: Steel Tempest
ability.description: Yasuo stabs forward dealing damage. On third cast, Yasuo launches a tornado dealing damage and knocking up enemies in a line.

ability.name: Razor Shuriken
ability.description: Zed fires a shuriken in a line, damaging enemies it passes through.
